text: Ezɨ ia manmaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, otarir kamningɨn manamra afeziamɨn akam baragha an gɨn zui?” Ezɨ me Iesus mɨgɨa ghaze, “Otarir avebam.” Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn me mɨgɨa ghaze, “Kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei, gumazir dagɨaba isiba ko amizir arazir kurabagh amiba, me ia gafiragha faragha God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiamɨn aven zui.
